column2: All shares were issued in an acquisition by Blackstone Ventures Inc. ("Blackstone") of Lattice Biologics, Inc. ("Lattice") via Lattice's merger into a newly-formed subsidiary of Blackstone. Blackstone is known post-merger as Lattice Biologics Ltd.
column23: Shares issued in the transaction were valued at Cdn$0.30 per share. The Total Offering Amount was converted into U.S. dollars based on a 0.7215 Bank of Canada noon exchange rate in effect on December 23, 2015.
column52: Equity included 7,529,705 common shares and 31,375,648 non-voting restricted shares that are convertible, under certain circumstances, into common shares
